title: Rico: investir é pra você 4.73.9
text:
Rico: investir é pra você 4.73.9
Rico CTVM– Freeware – Android iOS
out of 3299 votes
Streamline your financial life and have everything in one place: access to the best investments on the market, digital account, instant payments (pix), credit and debit card, online trading platform, and stock market trading platforms!
At Rico, you can diversify your stock investments without worrying about brokerage fees. You can also find fixed-income investments with higher returns than savings accounts.
What you'll find in the Rico app:
- Diversified investment options
At Rico, you can invest in fixed-income products (Treasury Direct bonds, CDBs, LCIs, LCAs, CRIs, CRAs, among others) and variable-income products (investment funds, real estate funds, mini contracts (Mini Índice and Mini Dólar), BDRs, and stocks from the BM&F Stock Exchange).
- Stock Market
Track the performance of your assets, receive recommendations based on your profile, and trade on the stock market through our online trading platform.
- Agility for traders
Use the Super Daytrade mode and gain agility in buying and selling assets on the stock market.
- Digital Account
Want to use banking services such as instant payments via pix, receive your salary, and pay bills? Get to know Rico's digital account!
- Rico Card
Apply for Rico's credit and debit card and earn at least 1% investback on your expenses. And this amount increases if spent at any partner store in our benefits center.
- Riconnect
Get access to the Riconnect platform and find content created by our team of analysts, with the latest updates on the financial market, so you can always make the best choices for your portfolio.
Investing is for you! Open your account at Rico and find investments that yield more than savings accounts while being just as secure. Don't lose out to inflation anymore; open your account and start investing.
Overview
Rico: investir é pra você is a Freeware software in the category Business developed by
Rico CTVM.
The latest version of Rico: investir é pra você is 4.73.9, released on 01/06/2024. It was initially added to our database on 10/01/2023.
Rico: investir é pra você runs on the following operating systems: Android/iOS.
Users of Rico: investir é pra você gave it a rating of 5 out of 5 stars.
